item.title: A Collection of Resources for Learning R
item.description: Introduction to the Tidyverse Books R for Data Science R Cookbook Workshops from RStudio R for Excel Users Introduction to Data Science in the Tidyverse Data Visualization with ggplot2 Primers from RStudio Seminars/Lectures Intro to the Tidyverse by Thomas Mock Tidyverse Primer from RStudio Courses Intro to Tidyverse - LinkedIn Learning R Statistics - LinkedIn Learning Data Science Specialization from Johns Hopkins - Coursera Data Science Series from Harvard - edX Intermediate/Advanced R Users Books R Graphics Cookbook R Markdown Advanced R R Packages Hands on Machine Learning with R Workshops from RStudio What They Forgot to Teach You about R Tidy Time Series Analysis and Forecasting Big Data with dplyr Applied Machine Learning Seminars/Lectures Talks from rstudio::conf2020 Recommended Data Science Talks Letters to a Young Maintainer by Hadley Wickham Topological Techniques for Unsupervised Learning by Leland Mcinnes at PyData LA 2019 Visualizing uncertainty with hypothetical outcomes plots by Claus Wilke at rstudio::conf 2019 Teaching R to New Users: From tapply to Tidyverse by Roger Peng at UseR 2018
